tool.name: Create or Update Organism
tool.description: will create the organism if it doesn't exist, and update otherwise
tool.help:
**What it does**
Using a Jbrowse HTML Output, the tool will:: - **Update** an existing Apollo organism if ‘Select’ is toggled in the Organism Common Name Source field and an Organism is chosen from the resultant drop-down menu. - **Create** an Apollo organism if ‘Direct Entry’ is toggled in the Organism Common Name Source field. A unique name should be entered in the Organism field.
Appropriate evidence tracks are generated according to the Jbrowse input.
**WARNINGS**
- Do not use organism names which conflict with other users/organisms already existing in the database. - If you provide an Apollo JSON file, only the first organism block will be used in Common Name determination, as it is improbable you wish to apply a single JBrowse instance to multiple organisms.
@REFERENCES@
